title: (x) Colours of the Desert airline script - Murray Hill {Mike Y}
content:
Any takers?

[http://www.airliners.net/open.file/1020110/L/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113231/http:/www.airliners.net/open.file/1020110/L/ "http://www.airliners.net/open.file/1020110/L/")

Will

 [‹ wide square techno sans used on www.familytreecounseling.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18631 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Graphic designer" child-like script - Fig Script {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18657 "Go to next forum topic")
author: winglets747

comments.content:
That is [Murray Hill](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113231/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/murray-hill/), and old ATF typeface, now available from many foundries.

- Mike Yanega
The tail is so interesting, and then… Murray Hill.
It’s Pakistan... cut them some slack.
